sentences.en: a long, narrow band of cloud
sentences.cn: 窄长的云带

sentences.en: As the dusk shaded into night, we drove slowly through narrow alleys.
sentences.cn: 夜幕渐渐降临，我们驱车在狭窄的胡同里缓慢前行。

sentences.en: Below the bridge we could just discern a narrow, weedy ditch.
sentences.cn: 我们仅能依稀辨出桥下一条杂草丛生的窄沟。

sentences.en: He narrowed his eyes and gazed at the horizon.
sentences.cn: 他眯起眼睛凝望着地平线。

sentences.en: He squeezed through a narrow opening in the fence.
sentences.cn: 他从围栏上的狭窄缺口里挤了过去。

sentences.en: He was criticised for being boring, strait-laced and narrow-minded.
sentences.cn: 他被指无趣乏味，古板守旧，心胸狭窄。

sentences.en: I hear you had a very narrow escape on the bridge.
sentences.cn: 我听说你在桥上险些出事。

sentences.en: I've managed to narrow the list down to twenty-three.
sentences.cn: 我已设法把清单上的项目压缩到了23项。

sentences.en: It is essentially a narrow and conservative approach to child care.
sentences.cn: 这实质上是一种狭隘的、因循守旧的照顾孩子的方法。

sentences.en: Roll out the pastry and cut into narrow strips.
sentences.cn: 把油酥面团擀薄然后切成长条。

sentences.en: Sailing boats lay at anchor in the narrow waterway.
sentences.cn: 帆船停泊在狭窄的水道上。

sentences.en: The company offered only a narrow range of financial services.
sentences.cn: 该公司只提供有限种类的金融服务。

sentences.en: The stairs were very narrow.
sentences.cn: 楼梯非常狭窄。

sentences.en: The track divided into two and narrowed.
sentences.cn: 小道分成两条并且变窄了。

sentences.en: The truck sways wildly, careening down narrow mountain roads.
sentences.cn: 卡车疯狂地左摇右晃，从狭窄的山路上急冲而下。

sentences.en: The voters gave a narrow win to Vargas Llosa.
sentences.cn: 投票者使巴尔加斯·略萨险胜.

sentences.en: They chased down the stairs into the narrow, dirty street.
sentences.cn: 他们冲下楼梯，来到狭窄、肮脏的街上。

sentences.en: They fought running battles in the narrow streets with police.
sentences.cn: 他们在狭窄的街道上和警察打起了游击战。

sentences.en: Two police officers had a narrow escape when separatists attacked their vehicles.
sentences.cn: 分裂主义者袭击他们的车辆时，两名警官死里逃生。

sentences.en: Various men kept banging into me in the narrow corridor.
sentences.cn: 在这条狭窄的走廊上，不断有人撞到我。

sentences.en: You’ve got a very narrow view of life.
sentences.cn: 你的人生观非常狭隘。
